pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimate Gaussian Mixture Vector Autoregressive Model // Unconstrained and constrained maximum likelihood estimation of Gaussian Mixture Vector Autoregressive (GMVAR) model, quantile residual tests, graphical diagnostics, simulations, and forecasting. Leena Kalliovirta, Mika Meitz, Pentti Saikkonen (2016) doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2016.02.012.
